title: IN-Game/Client bug

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: I finished playing an aram with my friend and i'm still stuck in the game when it has finished? I tried relogging it didn't work. My friend is out fine but i seem to be stuck in a game that has finished and can't leave it. I tried reconnecting but it just black screens. Help me senpai Rito :C {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body:
Hey,

We're currently aware of connectivity issues for some players.   What ISP are you with and what city are you in?

Keep an eye on [this thread](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/yLWijwsJ-connection-issues-6th-november-2015-515pm-aedt) for more details

Mindstar

ISP is Spark NZ im in Palmerston North New Zealand. It was a Normal game for me, joined via party lobby, the after match notes never loaded and i was then unable to create a game. After a restart it requests that i join the game i disconnected from
I seem to be out now! But that is a weird "bug" that could use some fixing ;o {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
